article_title: Sitting pretty: As the business of baby-sitting goes into overdrive for New Year’s Eve, websites can help
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.author: CHAD UMBLE | Staff Writer

og.description: The hunt for a baby sitter, which typically begins with a relative and extends to a neighborhood teenager, can now include searches on websites dedicated to matching parents with sitters.
